hero.title: Wan 2.5
hero.description: Revolutionary AI video creation with native audio generation. Create stunning videos from text or images with perfectly synchronized sound, music, and voiceover - all in one seamless process powered by Alibaba's cutting-edge technology.

whatIs.title: What is Wan 2.5?
whatIs.description: Wan 2.5 is Alibaba's breakthrough AI model that creates professional videos with native audio synchronization. Unlike traditional tools requiring separate audio editing, Wan 2.5 generates complete videos with ambient sounds, background music, and voiceover in a single process. Supporting resolutions from 480p to 1080p, it transforms text prompts and images into cinematic content with perfect audio-visual harmony, making it ideal for content creators, marketers, and educators seeking efficient, cost-effective video production.

examples.title: Wan 2.5 Examples
examples.description: Discover amazing videos created with Wan 2.5's native audio generation technology. See how text prompts and static images transform into dynamic content with synchronized soundtracks, ambient effects, and natural audio that perfectly matches the visual narrative.

steps.title: Upload Your Image
steps.content: Select and upload your source image - whether it's artwork, photography, product shots, or concept designs. Wan 2.5 supports multiple formats and prepares your visual foundation for animation transformation.

steps.title: Provide a Prompt
steps.content: Describe your desired video outcome including motion, audio elements, and scene dynamics. Specify soundtrack preferences, ambient sounds, or voiceover requirements to guide Wan 2.5's comprehensive audio-visual generation process.

steps.title: Generate Video
steps.content: Activate the AI generation process and watch Wan 2.5 create your complete video with synchronized audio. The advanced model renders high-quality visuals while simultaneously generating matching soundscapes and audio elements.

steps.title: Download and Share
steps.content: Export your finished video with integrated audio in your preferred resolution and format. Share your professionally synchronized content across social platforms, marketing campaigns, or educational channels immediately.

benefits.title: Why Use Wan 2.5?
benefits.description: Experience the next generation of AI video creation with native audio synchronization, cost-effective production, and professional-quality results.

features.title: Native Audio Generation
features.content: First-ever AI video model with built-in audio synchronization, creating complete videos with ambient sounds, music, and voiceover automatically.

features.title: Cost-Effective Solution
features.content: Significantly more affordable than premium competitors like Google Veo 3 and Runway, delivering professional results at accessible pricing.

features.title: Lightning-Fast Processing
features.content: Generate high-quality videos with audio faster than traditional AI video tools, streamlining your creative workflow and boosting productivity.

features.title: Multi-Resolution Support
features.content: Create videos in 480p, 720p, or 1080p resolution to match your specific project requirements and platform specifications perfectly.

features.title: Dual Input Flexibility
features.content: Work with both text prompts and image inputs, offering versatile creative options for diverse content creation needs and artistic visions.

features.title: Enterprise-Grade Reliability
features.content: Built on Alibaba Cloud's robust DashScope platform, ensuring consistent performance, scalability, and professional-level service reliability for all users.
